Also, I’m gonna have to be honest here and agree with everyone else that the story is pretty shit. I can tell that it was trying to go for a “wholesome slut” angle, but fucking the entire class (not even dating/having failed relationships mind you, just pleasure seeking hook-ups) as part of some asinine, roundabout plan to try and get and get the attention of the one person she likes is about as wholesome as a crucifixion. As someone said before, it really does just come off more as an NTR wannabe, not because she fucked all those other dudes, but because we’re supposed to believe that she was in love with this one guy all the time. Like an attempt at a pre-emptive NTR, if you will.
